channel.title: Main Page on Barnard's Star
channel.description: Recent content in Main Page on Barnard's Star

item.title: 20d Patch Notes - Online Bot Games & New Mutations
item.description: You can now play online games against bots!

item.title: 20c Patch Notes - Flavor Text & Bugfixes
item.description: The exciting new thing for this update is flavor text for all the units!

item.title: 20a Patch Notes - Season 4 and Map Editor
item.description: Season 4 is launching! Introducing Chembot (Automechanic rework) and the brand new Map Editor!

item.title: 19a Patch Notes - Tons of balance changes & fixes
item.description: This update has been a long time coming – thanks for your patience!

item.title: 18e Patch Notes - Teams & Balance Changes
item.description: Teams! Since 4-player games were released, players (myself included) have been faking team games in Free-For-Alls.

item.title: 18c Patch Notes - Balance Changes & Bugfixes
item.description: Another small update - but some big balance changes coming in!

item.title: 18b Patch Notes - Bugfixes
item.description: This is a minor bugfix update - please see the last patch notes for the meaty Season 3 changes!

item.title: 18a Patch Notes - 3-4 Player Games, and Beginning of Season 3
item.description: Welcome to version 18a! The big feature this version adds to the game is the ability to have 3-4 player games, instead of just 2 players.

item.title: 17d Patch Notes - Friends system
item.description: This patch adds a new Friends system! Add other players as friends, and invite them to games, directly from the app.

item.title: 17b Patch Notes
item.description: This patch mainly consists of bugfixes relating to changes made in the last patch, 17a (the one that introduced the beginning of season 2).

item.title: 17a Patch Notes - Beginning of Season 2
item.description: Welcome to version 17a, the very first balance patch since Barnard’s Star was launched!
